ruleset.name: Tom Kyte's Despair
ruleset.description: Rules based on Thomas Kyte's recommendations on http://asktom.oracle.com/ and http://tkyte.blogspot.com/.

rule.name: TomKytesDespair
rule.message: WHEN OTHERS THEN NULL - when you do this, Tom Kyte cries
rule.description: "WHEN OTHERS THEN NULL" hides all errors - (Re)RAISE an exception or call RAISE_APPLICATION_ERROR
